AbstractText.sentence: Primer extension and lacZ-operon fusion analyses revealed that gntT has one strong and two weak promoters, all of which are regulated positively by cAMP-CRP and negatively by GntR.

AbstractText.sentence: The weak promoters became constitutive when separated from the upstream region including the strong promoter that overlaps a putative GntR-binding sequence.
